law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to protect Armed Forces service members from dishonest and predatory insurance sales practices.
law.text: The commissioner shall have the authority to promulgate regulations to protect service members of the United States Armed Forces from dishonest and predatory insurance sales practices by declaring certain identified practices to be false, misleading, deceptive, or unfair in accordance with the Military Personnel Financial Services Protection Act of 2006, Pub. L. No. 109-290.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1113, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008.
